            <string language="x-mt-de">Brechung des Lichtes</string>

          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the bending or refraction of light through air and water boundary.</string>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt das Verbiegen oder die

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre le dépliement ou la

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a dobra ou o refraction da

          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la piegatura o la

            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει την κάμψη ή διάθλαση του

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la flexión o la
